text: Waterloo Road may mean: ==Transportation-related== * Waterloo Road, London, England * Waterloo Road, Hong Kong, a road joining another road * Waterloo Road (NSR) railway station, a former railway station of the North Staffordshire Railway * Waterloo Road, the first name of Blackpool South railway station ==Arts and entertainment== * Waterloo Road (movie), 1945 British movie * Waterloo Road (TV series), BBC One drama series about a school and its teachers and students * "Waterloo Road", 1969 British song recorded in French under the name "Les Champs-Élysées"
title: Waterloo Road
